$nativeTenantName.title: Org Unit Name
$nativeTenantName.description: Org or Org Unit tenant name

enableIAPDataCollection.title: enableIAPDataCollection
enableIAPDataCollection.description: Flag that determines whether IAP data collection is enabled for the Application. When set to true, IAP will automatically generate and update Application entities in the system based on collected metadata. If set to false, data collection is disabled and no new Application entities will be created or updated in IAP.
